alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Inland Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 2:22PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Aransas and central Refugio Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Tivoli, or 13 miles south of McFaddin, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockport, Refugio, Lamar, Quintana, Key Allegro, Holiday Beach, Tivoli, Aransas National Wildlife Refuge, Copano Village, Fulton and Austwell. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 664 and 668. US Highway 77 between mile markers 608 and 622. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Inland Refugio
